q: Why do charts not show more than 30 days of data
a: Charts obey each metric's retention_days. Data older than retention_days will not be shown. This is intended behavior.
Widgets can be hidden or archived. Toggle visibility in the dashboard editor or check with an editor on your team.
Private projects require a permission row with at least viewer. Ask a project admin to grant you access.
If filters are narrow or the metric has no recent samples in the last 1 to 2 days, the chart may appear empty. Verify filters and ingestion.
